chapter.title: Advanced Desktop Configuration
chapter.para: Tato část přináší tipy pro používání a přizpůsobování prostředí pracovní plochy Ubuntu (nazývané GNOME) a správce souborů (nazývaného Nautilus).

sect1.title: Log in automatically when the computer starts
sect1.para: To log in automatically when the computer starts:

step.para: Choose &login-screen-setup;.
Select Security, and turn on Enable Automatic Login.
Choose the account you want to log in as.

sect1.para: This is not recommended for most computers, as it is not secure and may give other people access to your information.

sect1.title: Otevírat soubory s administrátorskými právy v souborovém manažeru
sect1.para: To open files with administrative privileges from the file manager, you need to add a script to Nautilus.

warning.para: Opening files with administrative privileges is a security risk. Always ensure that you are familiar with the file that you are opening.

step.para: Otevřít nový soubor k editaci v relevantním adresáři: gedit $HOME/.gnome2/nautilus-scripts/Open\ as\ Administrator
Enter these lines in the new file:
step.programlisting: for uri in $NAUTILUS_SCRIPT_SELECTED_URIS; do↵ gksudo "gnome-open $uri" &↵ done

step.para: Save the edited file (an example)
Změňte soubor tak, aby byl spustitelný: chmod +x $HOME/.gnome2/nautilus-scripts/Open\ as\ Administrator

sect1.para: You can now open a file as an administrator by right-clicking on it and choosing Scripts Open as Administrator .

step.para: Open the Configuration Editor, by running the program gconf-editor (see the run application manual for help on how to run an application without using the menu).

Choose
apps nautilus desktop .
Turn on computer_icon_visible, home_icon_visible, and trash_icon_visible. The changes take effect immediately.
Uložit a zavřít otevřené aplikace.

Use the Ctrl Alt Backspace
shortcut keys to restart GNOME.

If Ctrl Alt Backspace
is disabled, type sudo /etc/init.d/gdm restart
(See to disable Ctrl Alt Backspace .)
Vytvořte záložní kopii /etc/X11/xorg.conf : sudo cp /etc/X11/xorg.conf /etc/X11/xorg.conf_backup
Open /etc/X11/xorg.conf for editing: sudo gedit /etc/X11/xorg.conf
Vložte následující řádky na konec souboru: Section "ServerFlags"↵ Option "DontZap" "yes"↵ EndSection
Save the edited file (an example).
